==Trivia==

* {{W|Mayahuel}} is the female deity associated with the {{W|Agave americana|maguey}} plant among cultures of central Mexico in the Postclassic era of {{W|Pre-Columbian era|pre-Columbian}} {{W|Mesoamerican chronology}}, and in particular of the {{W|Aztecs|Aztec}} cultures.
